change set 85353 build error ? i deleted the question marked .snk file , rebuild , no error but when referencing this dll , FileNotFoundException : Could not load file or assembly 'HtmlAgilityPack, Version=1.9.0.1, Culture=en-US, PublicKeyToken=null' or one of its dependencies. @frasera your error has been fixed, it was due to the experimental .NET 4.0 project being included in the solution. I removed that over the weekend

 

@dfang

The only place I see the snk error is under htmlagilitypack-85383\Branches\2.0.Experimental. That one is listed as version 1.9.0.1 and should not be used, thus the name Experimental

Trunk builds just fine for me. Do not use the fx.4.0 project, that was an experimental test of trying to use the .NET 4.0 dynamic features. Use the main HtmlAgilityPack project under trunk. I downloaded the changeset zip file and it built without a problem through both the HtmlAgilityPack2010.sln and HtmlAgilityPack20008.sln solution files
cool thanks, i did a clean checkout and its working now thanks.
